examples.example: 生活中有许多美好的事物等待我们去发现。

translate.english: There are many wonderful things in life waiting for us to discover.

examples.example: 人生中有许多宝贵的机会需要我们去把握。

translate.english: There are many precious opportunities in life that need us to grasp.

examples.example: 这个世界上有许多有趣的地方值得我们去探索。

translate.english: There are many interesting places in this world that are worth our exploration.
